items.title: Becoming Congruent
items.summary: My big realization this morning as I awakened was that. I'm not going to lie anymore. A lie for the right reason is still a lie and it eats at my soul. However I also do not have to confess my truths just because someone…
items.content_html:
My big realization this morning as I awakened was that. I'm not going to lie anymore. A lie for the right reason is still a lie and it eats at my soul.

However I also do not have to confess my truths just because someone asks.

It's no one's business.
Adultery is a made up crime. A crime that is man made. And historically the woman is punished much more harshly than the man.

That is incongruent
That I no longer subscribe too.

So in the future, when pressed to confess, I will plead the fifth.

I shall be my beautiful sinful self. And I will be a loving kind person
And I will accept and forgive the petty crimes of my fellow humans because that is simply just part of life.

Those that judge can stand on their high horse, living incongruous and I will accept and forgive.

And turn my lip so slightly as to hide the smile of recognition.

 No one is innocent.

items.title: Learning Love
items.summary: I thought being needed was love but that equation creates a loop that isn't solvable. being needed: I look for perceived needs and fill them, I have to keep filling to feel love, but then I get exhausted. Then I don't feel appreciated and that…
items.content_html:
I thought being needed was love but that equation creates a loop that isn't solvable.

being needed:
I look for perceived needs and fill them, I have to keep filling to feel love, but then I get exhausted. Then I don't feel appreciated and that turns to resentment and then that turns to guilt and lack so then I need to be needed and it starts all over again.

I need to be needed = love
The other person needs to satisfy my need to be loved. 

Read that again.  

It feels like love because filling their need actually satisfies my need to be needed.

I think being needed is love!!

This epiphany washed over me.  Magically I now see their needs as their need. Period. 

Take a beat. Assess. Just because they 'need' doesn't mean I have to fill that need. Is it mine to fill? Is it someone else's? Is it realistic?

I can monitor my giving.  And now I am forming a healthy boundary. I can show love and not over give.  

Full circle:  The people that love me but don't need me I could not see.  
I could not see the people who didn't need me because that didn't register as love. Because I learned to believe that LOVE looked and felt like being needed and me fulfilling that need. 

I am now understanding love as something much more calm and peaceful.

items.title: The Ocean in Your Eyes
items.summary: I’m swimming in the ocean in your eyes It is vast and wide Forever it holds me I float in that ocean The waves carry me Gentle breezes Swaying to and fro Even when seas get stormy the sun shines brightly again And I’m still…
items.content_html:
I’m swimming in the ocean in your eyes
It is vast and wide
Forever it holds me
I float in that ocean

The waves carry me
Gentle breezes
Swaying to and fro

Even when seas get stormy the sun shines brightly again
And I’m still there floating in the ocean of your eyes

It is a very comfortable place
Familiar and safe
I’ve been here before caught in the ocean in your eyes

Your ocean is expansive
I’m a mere drop of water
Part of something bigger than myself

The ocean in your eyes is no ones to contain, to control
I’m in awe and wonder

I see myself in the ocean in your eyes
I wail up in tears
My eyes weep a drop and we swirl together
Not knowing where one begins and the other ends

Blissfully in wonderment, I witness the beauty and grace
The power and force of the ocean in your eyes
Mesmerized

I shake and tremble with ever-flowing love
The ocean in your eyes belongs to no one

Not everyone can see it
Nor comprehend the grandeur
Yet you offer it freely

The ocean in your eyes knows no lack, no scarcity, no limits

Boundless, formless, space, energy, infinity
The ocean in your eyes reminds me we are not alone
We are part of so much more

I see also pain in the ocean in your eyes
This conduit that transmits so easily the frequencies of everyone, everything
The ocean in your eyes is a beautiful reflection back to those who are ready to see.
I see myself in the ocean in your eyes in a way I’ve never seen before.

I choose to see, to look, to feel and do my own work to heal

You are safe behind the reflection of the ocean in your eyes
You see people looking there, you see what they see, safely behind the reflection

No one can own the ocean in your eyes
They may try to siphon some for themselves or take a bucket full out

The ocean in your eyes is abundance, your connection to source
Ever present, it washes over you, it grounds you when you let it

Thank you for showing me the ocean in your eyes
For letting me swim and swirl
Feel my respect and awe, my deep admiration

For the ocean in your eyes does not belong to me, to anyone

The ocean in your eyes is freedom
Let the ocean breeze guide your waves
Your connection to source, your compass

items.title: Whirlwind
items.summary: I'm in a whirlwind Tossing and turning Flying high Breaking barriers Freeing my mind Taking flight Anything is possible So many layers Bottom up Top down My eyes are open Seeing it all Flying by Grooving Leaving the past Reshaping Rebuilding Regenerating I'm in a…
items.content_html:
I'm in a whirlwind
Tossing and turning
Flying high
Breaking barriers
Freeing my mind

Taking flight
Anything is possible
So many layers
Bottom up
Top down

My eyes are open
Seeing it all
Flying by
Grooving
Leaving the past

Reshaping
Rebuilding
Regenerating

I'm in a whirlwind
Moving fast
Taking it slow
Vibrating higher
Than I ever know

Life is meant to live
Living is being alive

Leave the old beliefs
Let the whirlwind
Carry you away

items.title: The dysfunctional quagmire of the status quo
items.summary: To leave the comfort of the old sh*t requires some gumption and the willingness to let go of old opinions. Which kinda sums up my day. Which wraps up another layer of the life I'm moving on from. These are not easy things. They are…
items.content_html:
To leave the comfort of the old sh*t requires some gumption and the willingness to let go of old opinions.

Which kinda sums up my day. Which wraps up another layer of the life I'm moving on from.

These are not easy things.
They are uncomfortable and these actions tend to upset the dysfunctional quagmire of status quo

-huh- 
-what-
I was just rambling writing, and damn.
"The dysfunctional quagmire of the status quo"...

Fkn love that line.

items.title: The Human Harmony
items.summary: I'm raw material Ready to shape shift Aware of the layers Taking on shapes To navigate experience To experience life There's a pattern A resonance to our life To the human condition We are played Or we become a player Awareness of the patterns Allows…
items.content_html:
I'm raw material
Ready to shape shift
Aware of the layers
Taking on shapes
To navigate experience
To experience life

There's a pattern
A resonance to our life
To the human condition
We are played
Or we become a player

Awareness of the patterns
Allows us to navigate the layers
The more aware
The more the symphony plays
The beautiful symphony of life
The chords their harmony
Their dissonance

The emotional chords of love and loss
Seeking and wanting connection
Slightly out of tune

Ah, but life is a self correcting chorus
And we all have our beautiful part to play

items.title: A Good Life
items.summary: Intro I wanted more, From life I didn’t get to do, everything, i wanted Cuz I wanted more, from life I always thought there’d be more time V1 I overcame, my childhood burdens I learned to, take care of myself One step at a time,…
items.content_html:
Intro
I wanted more, From life
I didn’t get to do, everything, i wanted
Cuz I wanted more, from life
I always thought there’d be more time

V1
I overcame, my childhood burdens
I learned to, take care of myself
One step at a time, I improvised, Improved my life, My circumstance
Moved to Hollywood, the land of dreams
Made my way, all the way, to Beverly Hills
Swimming pools, movie stars

PRE

V2
I desired, the finer things in life,
I worked hard, so I could fit in
One event at a time, I connected, saved my money, got fancy clothes
Met movie stars, the rich and famous
Before you know it, I hobnobbing
Beach parties, private clubs

PRE

Chorus
Oh so grateful for a good life
Wasn’t always easy, this life
Oh so grateful for a good life
Wasn’t always easy, this life

V3
Later in life, I found true love
4th of July, sucking on toes
Hawaii life, became your wife
Our love story, so real, so true
Met all your friends, over all night dinners
Now I’m a valley girl, with 9 step kids
Movie nights, Cadillac margaritas

Bridge
Our story, ended way to soon,
So grateful, life with you

Chorus out 

Lyrics: Vicki Langford.  Guitar: Marty Simon.  Drums:  Zev Stein. 

This audio file is from a recording i did using bandlab with just the guitar track and then my vocal.  At the time the band practices stopped, I hadn't written lyrics for this piece.  This piece ended up being very special as it became a tribute to my sister, Jeannie Larson, who passed in Nov 2023.  I got the bulk of the song done in Sep 2023 and my sister was able to hear that.  I finished this the night before and the morning of her burial in Jan 2024.  This was played at her service.  #love

items.title: My Warm Bed
items.summary: I've made it to my warm bed. Curating ones bed. The bed itself. soft, firm or somewhere in-between The sheets. sheen, softness, texture The covers. heaviness, thickness, layers The pillows. firmness, flexibility, quantity Curled up or sprawled across It's a very personal space Our comfortable…
items.content_html:
I've made it to my warm bed.

Curating ones bed.

The bed itself. soft, firm or somewhere in-between

The sheets. sheen, softness, texture

The covers. heaviness, thickness, layers

The pillows. firmness, flexibility, quantity

Curled up or sprawled across

It's a very personal space

Our comfortable space.
Comfy cozy
Warm snuggly
Sleepy drifting

Safe

items.title: In the pause of nature
items.summary: Sitting in the window seat the window open listening to the wind feeling the rain watching for lightening flashes hearing the thunder rumbles the expansion of what we thought about what we are literally our energy field extends limitless across the earth and beyond infinity…
items.content_html:
Sitting in the window seat
the window open
listening to the wind
feeling the rain
watching for lightening flashes
hearing the thunder rumbles

the expansion of what we thought
about what we are
literally our energy field extends limitless

across the earth and beyond

infinity let me on

items.title: Force Of Life
items.summary: Sometimes I'm a hurricane Sometimes I'm a sunny day I'm a force of nature And can't be contained Controlled My energy courses through all life We are one energy Force of Life Let the wind blow And the thunder roar Let it all wash over…
items.content_html:
Sometimes I'm a hurricane
Sometimes I'm a sunny day

I'm a force of nature
And can't be contained
Controlled

My energy courses through all life
We are one energy
Force of Life

Let the wind blow
And the thunder roar
Let it all wash over and through

Respect me
Be in awe of me

Sometimes I'm the rainbow
After the storm
Sometimes I'm the summer breeze

Sometimes my lightning crashes and
Causes damage

All my forms are necessary
They all serve a purpose

I'm all powerful and control nothing
I'm awe inspiring and seek no validation
